prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has intricate patterns on its wings and a mystical aura.
I want a fairy-type Pokemon that glows in the dark and has a playful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique shell design and ethereal colors, perfect for a mythical creature.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a guardian of the sea, with elegant fins and a serene expression.
Imagine a creature that embodies both water and fairy elements, showcasing vibrant colors and enchanting features.
Design a Pokemon featuring a combination of aquatic and mystical traits, with a striking silhouette.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that has a sleek and aerodynamic body, adorned with magical symbols.

distinctive_features: Elegant fins extending from the body
